titleInfo.title: Ext 7390/41 ‘Severance of relations by Danish Legation in Tehran with German controlled Danish Govt’

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a number of telegrams sent between Sir Richard William Bullard, HM Minister to Persia [Iran]; and the Foreign Office. The subject matter is the severance of relations by the Danish Chargé d'affaires at Tehran, Mr A C Fensmark, from the Danish Government in Copenhagen, and his recognition by Persia of his status as representative of the Danish community in Persia.A list of correspondence references by year can be found on the front cover.
